AT.name: Word Logic by POWGI
AT.description: Enjoy six brand new POWGI word puzzles with this bumper collection of games. This time, the games share a common theme of logic and deduction. Solve hundreds of pencil-and-paper style puzzles using the stylus and a choice of intuitive touch-screen controls or handwriting recognition. The puzzles included are: Kriss Kross The classic word-fit puzzle. Place words into the grid using their length as a guide, and using logic to make sure everything overlaps correctly! Ladders Make new words by changing one letter at a time. Can you turn one word into another in a limited number of steps? Crypto A cipher puzzle (also known as a cryptogram) which reveals a quote when you crack the code! Word Sudoku It's sudoku with words! Place nine letters according to usual sudoku rules. As an extra clue, one row or column will spell a word. Gaps Several words have one letter missing. Deduce the correct letter to fill in the gaps and spell a new word! Wordsweeper Drawing inspiration from Minesweeper, the clues tell you which letter can be placed in an adjacent square. It's a crossword-style puzzle solved using logic! POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure!

BE.name: Word Logic by POWGI
BE.description: Profitez de nouveaux défis de mots POWGI avec cette collection réunissant six nouveaux jeux ! Cette fois, les jeux partagent un thème commun de la logique et de la déduction. Résolvez des centaines de défis en utilisant le stylet et un choix de commandes intuitives de l'écran tactile ou la reconnaissance de l'écriture manuscrite. Les jeux inclus sont les suivants : Kriss Kross, Ladders, Crypto, Word Sudoku, Gaps, Wordsweeper.

Wordsweeper Drawing inspiration from Minesweeper, the clues tell you which letter can be placed in an adjacent square. It's a crossword-style puzzle solved using logic! POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure!

SE.name: Word Logic by POWGI
SE.description: Enjoy six brand new POWGI word puzzles with this bumper collection of games. This time, the games share a common theme of logic and deduction. Solve hundreds of pencil-and-paper style puzzles using the stylus and a choice of intuitive touch-screen controls or handwriting recognition. The puzzles included are: Kriss Kross The classic word-fit puzzle. Place words into the grid using their length as a guide, and using logic to make sure everything overlaps correctly! Ladders Make new words by changing one letter at a time. Can you turn one word into another in a limited number of steps? Crypto A cipher puzzle (also known as a cryptogram) which reveals a quote when you crack the code! Word Sudoku It's sudoku with words! Place nine letters according to usual sudoku rules. POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure!
